title: `default` value must validate
description: `default` is supposed to be a valid example of the instance. If it does **not** satisfy the schema, drop it so that tools and docs are not mis-led.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Default does not satisfy integer type
comprehensiveExamples.description: Remove default when its value fails validation.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Default object violates property types
comprehensiveExamples.description: Default must be a valid instance of the schema.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Valid default is acceptable
comprehensiveExamples.description: A default that validates can remain.
